headline: Kimberly-Clark (NYSE:KMB) Unveils Goodnites XXL Size For Improved Bedwetting Solutions
summary: Kimberly-Clark (NYSE:KMB), known for its innovative product launches, recently introduced the new XXL size for its Goodnites line, aiming to provide inclusive solutions for children with bedwetting issues. This launch, alongside broader market trends, including a generally flat market performance, may have influenced the company's stock price change of approximately 10%. Additionally, amid volatile trading conditions, the company's recent earnings guidance and share buyback activities...

headline: Goodnites® Launches New Larger Size Nighttime Underwear for Growing Kids
summary: Goodnites®, the #1 nighttime underwear1 brand, is announcing the launch of its new XXL size, fitting kids up to 165 lbs. The brand believes bedwetting should not define a child and is proud to better serve the needs of children who experience bedwetting by providing size-inclusive products with outstanding comfort and up to 100% leak-free overnight protection.
